text: The Frumușeaua is a right tributary of the river Vișeu in Romania. It discharges into the Vișeu near Petrova. Its length is and its basin size is .Analysis of 3-10 March 2001 flood in the basins of the Vișeu and Iza Rivers ==References== Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Maramureș County
title: Frumușeaua
